project_abstract.cdata: The Yangtze Basin Water Resources Project will raise agricultural production and incomes; reduce the risk and impact of floods; introduce a more sustainable and cost-effective system of operation and maintenance of irrigation and drainage schemes; and promote institutional reform and strengthening and improve planning and environmental monitoring in the water sector. Key institutional development objectives will be to introduce comprehensive river basin management, and self-financing irrigation and drainage districts based on farmer participation. This will promote cost recovery, decentralization of services delivery, and participation by users which are key elements of Government and Bank water resources policy. The project will be the first Bank Group supported comprehensive water resources operation in China.

P003596.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>长江水资源开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将增加农业生产和收入，降低洪水风险和影响，引入更具可持续性和成本效益更高的灌排工程运行维护制度，促进水行业体制改革，加强并改进水行业规划和环境监测。制度建设的主要目标是实行流域综合管理，引入基于农户参与的经济自立灌排区概念。这将会促进成本回收、服务提供权下放和用水户参与，而这些是中国政府和世行水资源政策的关键内容。本项目是世行集团在华资助实施的首个综合水资源项目。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
